thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 14 of 227
thread.title: Patty S
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Patty S

author: Patty S
title: Patty S
text: First time in the store and we were not disappointed. The staff was very friendly and did not hover over you. They were just close enough if we had questions and were excellent with our two impatient children. We were able to choose the one item we came for without pressure to buy additional items and delivery was set up for the next day! We will definitely be buying more throughout the coming year and are impressed with the quality and look of the furniture.
